name: louie
description:
louie is part of the globus family. 

each globus lamp has a mixture of the following:

wood is from an old berlin beam, wheels and a toggle switch, uses the fixture fitting a E14. comes with a 15w and the plug is suitable only for an european outlet.

globus' have a lot of personality!

yellow plastic cable : 160 cm
height with glass : 24 cm
beam dimension 17 cm x 21 cm

postal costs are not yet figured! shipping varies, feel free to inquire. price depends on where in germany, europe or the world. 

a berlin pick up is also available.

name: press + play series 004
description:
"press + play" is a series originally influenced from the design of a record player. each one is unique with its materials, cable, etc.

nr. 004 is built from plywood wood, with a black button switch.

cable length : 130 cm
hand dyed, color : forest green, with white porcelain fixture
 
total height with bulb : 20 cm
bulb: nook 25w
european plug

platform height : 5 cm
width : 20 cm
length :  40 cm

postal costs are not yet figured! shipping varies, feel free to inquire. price depends on where in germany, europe or the world. 

a berlin pick up is also available.
